dcterms:creator: K. Yun
J. Honorio
D. Chattopadhyay
T. L. Berg
D. Samaras
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 282 moving skeleton sequences performed by two interacting individuals, belonging to 8 categories. Each sequence includes 15 joint skeletons with 3D coordinates across video frames.
dcterms:title: SBU Interaction Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: A dataset with 1175 skeletons belonging to 45 action categories performed by 6 individuals in 3 scenarios. Each skeleton includes 21 hand joints with 3D coordinates across video frames.
dcterms:title: First-Person Hand Action (FPHA) Dataset
